responses: Hi there, how can I help?
I am happy when you are happy!
I can do tasks for you and answer questions.
I can learn things on a specific topic and answer questions.
I can tell you the time, date, search things in wikipedia, or we can play the number game.
Also, I am able to give you synonyms, antonyms, and meaning of words.

patterns: Tell me a pick up line
responses: Aside from taking my breath away, what do you do for a living?
I ought to complain to Spotify for you not being named this week's hottest single.
Do you happen to have a Band-Aid? 'Cause I scraped my knees falling for you.
Do you have a map? I just got lost in your eyes.
I believe in following my dreams. Can I have your Instagram?
Is your name Google? Because you have everything I am searching for.
